# isContiguous

**Instance Property**

Determine whether the block buffer is contiguous.

## Declaration

```swift
var isContiguous: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

`true` if block buffer references a single contiguous memory block `false` otherwise. Also `false` if the buffer is empty.
title: isContiguous
